Package com.complexible.stardog.security

Collection of interfaces for using the Stardog security framework

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PermissionManager API for managing permissions in Stardog
RoleManager API for managing user roles in Stardog.
SecurityResourceType Interface for security resource types.
UserManager API for managing users in Stardog.
 

Enum Summary
ActionType Enumeration containing all action types that can be used in permissions
 

Exception Summary
StardogAuthenticationException Exception thrown when it was not possible to authenticate a stardog user with the provided credentials
StardogAuthorizationException Exception thrown when the user is not authorized to perform the operation.
 

Package com.complexible.stardog.security Description

Collection of interfaces for using the Stardog security framework
